SELECT l.d_name, l.d_repay, l.d_amount, l.d_balance, l.d_month, l.account, l.d_rate, l.d_start_date, l.d_end_date, d_next_rate FROM account_info i, loans l WHERE i.account = l.account AND i.account = #{account} AND l.d_state=1
SELECT l.d_name, l.account, l.d_start_date, l.d_end_date FROM account_info i, loans l WHERE i.account = l.account AND i.id=#{id} AND l.d_state=2

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account_info(account, ID, accountPW, Balance, accountType, accountState) VALUES('33'||'-'||'04'||'-'||LPAD(SEQ_ACCOUNT.NEXTVAL, 6, 0), #{id}, #{accountPW}, #{balance}, #{accountType}, #{accountState})

INSERT INTO Loans(d_Key, d_name, account, d_state, d_start_date, d_end_date, d_month, d_repay, d_rate, d_amount, d_balance, d_balance_rate, d_loan_balance, d_loan_rate, d_tran, d_tran_rate, d_next_rate, d_ERR, d_ERC, d_auto_account, d_auto_date) VALUES(SEQ_LOANS.NEXTVAL, #{d_name}, '33'||'-'||'04'||'-'||LPAD(SEQ_ACCOUNT.CURRVAL, 6, 0), #{d_state}, sysdate, add_months(sysdate, #{d_month}), #{d_month}, #{d_repay}, #{d_rate}, #{d_amount}, #{d_balance}, #{d_balance_rate}, #{d_loan_balance}, #{d_loan_rate}, #{d_tran}, #{d_tran_rate}, #{d_next_rate}, #{d_ERR}, #{d_ERC}, #{d_auto_account}, #{d_auto_date})
